problem.markdown:
>>What are three reasons to use tables in Excel?<<
[ ] To prevent accidental deletion of rows or columns. [x] To manage data in rows and columns in the worksheet independently. [x] To improve maintenance by creating expressions that refer to column names. [x] To quickly format table data by applying a predefined or custom table style.
[explanation] Using Excel tables does not prevent you to accidentally delete any rows or columns. [explanation]
problem.p: What are three reasons to use tables in Excel?
